mainText:
As I sit here typing on my Mac laptop, it's surreal that the man who 
made all this possible has died. I cried two years ago when I opened the 
iPhone that my sons gave me for Christmas. Some would think I was crazy, 
but that, I discovered was the kid in me. I had more fun with that phone 
over the Christmas holiday...learning, exploring, creating. Steve 
Jobs and Apple have created a whole new world for billions.

We have all been touched by an amazing man. My prayers are with his 
family and friends.
author: Kathy
